name: C.T. Bruni
text: Very nice staff and a good pie. Definitely better than the other chain pizza places! Their crust actually has flavor and they have a nice red sauce not sweet or too acidic, a good balanced base for the ingredients which were plentiful. On top of it all, it was a quick pickup. Approximately 10 minutes at the most.

name: Glenn Hilts
text: We are happy to be the FIRST customers to eat in upon opening post Craziness today!! The pizza was amazing (We moved here from upstate NY so We KNOW pizza). Friendly staff and the dining room was SPOTLESS! Stop in and support this small business and welcome back Hungry Howie's!! You won't be disappointed!

name: David F
